message: Starting stale data cleanup in SQLite database - will archive old INITIALIZED tasks and mark dead agents as terminated
Archived 36 old INITIALIZED tasks. Now fixing agents table issue and continuing cleanup
Archived 42 stale tasks and terminated 18 stale agents. Now verifying active counts through state_db module

Successfully cleaned up all stale data in SQLite database. Archived 44 tasks (42 INITIALIZED + 2 others), terminated 21 stale agents. Active counts now correct: 1 task, 2 agents. Created verification script to confirm cleanup success. Dashboard API needs updating to read from SQLite instead of JSON.
